thread.title: Thailand: Thai graft agency investigates suspected theft of funds for the poor

author: Benjamin Villaraza
title: Thailand: Thai graft agency investigates suspected theft of funds for the poor

organizations.name: office of public sector anti-corruption commission

text:
Thailand: Thai graft agency investigates suspected theft of funds for the poor March 21st, 2018 Asia 
A Thai anti-corruption agency is investigating the suspected misappropriation of up to 85 percent of money from a state fund for the poor in a new scandal to hit the military government, which has promised to clean up graft. 
The Office of Public Sector Anti-Corruption Commission (PACC) said on Tuesday it had found evidence of irregularities amounting to about 100 million baht ($3.2 million). 
“We have found that there are corrupt practices involving money destined for low-income people which the state allocates every year,” Korntip Daroj, secretary-general of the Office of Public Sector Anti-Corruption Commission (PACC), told Reuters. 
  uk.reuters.com
